prompt:

prompt:

###

prompt: What does XtraSaver offer?
completion: XtraSaver is an interest bearing current account that allows you to earn Cashback on your debit card purchases. Earn up to 15% CashBack on petrol on top of prevailing station discounts and receive up to 3% CashBack on your MasterCard transactions, anywhere in the world.

prompt: What does e$aver offer?
completion: With e$aver, you can earn up to 3.40% p.a. interest on eligible deposit balance up to S$2 million with no lock-in period - ejoy the flexibility to access your funds at any time.

prompt: What does MyWay offer?
completion: MyWay offers a lifestyle programme for 55 years and above to enjoy a world of exclusive dining, travel and healthcare privileges. You may enjoy interest rates of up to 0.30%p.a.^ with the MyWay Savings Account, access to income generating wealth solutions and enjoy privileges at selected merchants on travel and health.
